author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Court Of Appeals Adjudges Imagis With Amount Of 900,000 Zlotys
text:
Feb 22 (Reuters) - IMAGIS SA:
* SAID ON WEDNESDAY THAT COURT OF APPEALS IN WARSAW DISMISSED MARCIN NIEWEGLOWSKIâ€™S SUIT AND ADJUDGED IMAGIS WITH THE AMOUNT OF 900,000 ZLOTYS TOGETHER WITH STATUTORY INTEREST
* THE COURT ALSO DISMISSED THE COUNTERCLAIM FILED BY MARCIN NIEWEGLOWSKI AGAINST IMAGIS IN ITS ENTIRETY
* THE VERDICT IS FINAL Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
